content: HomeBlogDan Reynolds Account Executive, Lusha Dan Reynolds Dan Reynolds is an Account Executive at Lusha, the premier source for B2B contact and company data. Born and raised in Canada, his 3 passions are Family, Sales, and Sports. He ended his High School baseball career by hitting his first home run in his last at-bat.
